articles.title: Microsoft brings OpenAI’s DALL-E image creator to the new Bing - TechCrunch
articles.description: Microsoft has now integrated OpenAI's DALL-E generative AI image creator into its new Bing Chat feature.
articles.content: Microsoft today announced that its new AI-enabled Bing will now allow users to generate images with Bing Chat. This new feature is powered by DALL-E, OpenAI’s generative image generator. The company … [+2589 chars]

articles.title: Massive Solar Eruption Blasts NASA Probe Head-On Before Impacting Earth - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A massive eruption of solar material, known as a coronal mass ejection or CME, was detected escaping from the Sun at 11:36 p.m. EDT on March 12, 2023. The CME erupted from the side of the Sun opposite Earth. While resarchers are still gathering data to determ…
articles.content:
ByNASAMarch 21, 2023
A powerful solar eruption is likely to have hit NASAs Parker Solar Probe head-on. This artists animation shows the spacecraft as it officially touched the Sun. Launched in 2018 … [+7352 chars]
